alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Herkimer; Montgomery (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 1:58PM EDT until August 04 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Fulton County in eastern New York... Southern Herkimer County in eastern New York... Northwestern Montgomery County in eastern New York... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 158 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clayville, or near New Hartford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Mohawk, Frankfort, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Newport, Stratford, Middleville, Jordanville, Cedarville, Oppenheim, Fairfield, Elizabethtown, Warren, Norway, Ingham Mills, Spinnerville and Cedar Lake. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
